ansible_host: 192.168.1.100
ansible_user: deploy
ansible_python_interpreter: /usr/bin/python3

nginx:
  port: 80
  worker_processes: auto
  keepalive_timeout: 65

app:
  name: myapp
  version: 2.1.0
  environment: production
  features:
    - authentication
    - logging
    - monitoring

database:
  host: db.example.com
  port: 5432
  name: myapp_prod
